def pnm.pathfinding.agentManager.AgentManager.__Agent.setGoal (   self,
  _goal 
)

Set the agent's goal location and calculate a path to it.

This calls navigationMesh.NavigationMesh.findPath to calculate a path to the given goal location

Parameters:
_goal - A OGRE Vector3 describing the goal location

Member Data Documentation

pnm.pathfinding.agentManager.AgentManager.__Agent.__goal [private]

The Agents goal location (an OGRE Vector3).

If None, then the Agent is stationary

The AgentManager this agent is within.

The OGRE SceneNode controlled by the agent.
